description: Holds data on tasks, including task ID, title, category, description, notes, assignment details (to students or leads), reminders, start and end times, related URL, deletion status, and unique task number, created_date
Holds data on student orders with student_name, program ID, order ID, order date, and order_value. Links to contacts via student_name. Uniquely identified by order_id.
Holds data on student programs, including program name, unique program ID, associated program, start and end dates, student_name (links to contacts), active status, and deletion status, created_date
Holds data on programs, including program name, unique program identifier, and deletion status, uniquely identified by an auto-incrementing program ID.

Holds data on cases with case_id, subject, category, subcategory, description, notes, status, assignment details, student_name (links to contacts.student_name), deletion status, and unique case_number, created_date. Related to contacts table.

Primary table for all students/contacts. Contains student_name (primary identifier), first_name, last_name, email, phone, addresses, birthday, gender, occupation, job_title, interests, social profiles, lead info, tags, notes, and timestamps. NO deleted_status column. Links to cases (via student_name), orders (via student_name), and student_programs (via student_name).

Holds payment data with payment_id, payment_number, payment_type, amount, order_id (references orders.order_id), payment_date, and payment_status ('done', 'pending', 'in-progress'). Links to orders table via order_id.
